Title: Generation P
Writer: Djina Ginzburg (screenplay), Victor Ginzburg (screenplay), Viktor Pelevin (novel)
Actors: Vladimir Epifantsev, Mikhail Efremov, Andrey Fomin, Sergey Shnurov
Plot: Generation P is at once a comedy, a tragedy and a historical epic about the rise of a poet-turned-copywriter through Russia's nascent advertising business in post-Communist Moscow, to the chief "creative" behind the virtual world of Russian politics.
